snippet: Lawyers for Mr. Silver, who was forced to step down as the Assembly speaker after his arrest, argued that the conduct he is accused of “simply does not amount to any federal offense.”
abstract: Lawyers for New York State Assemblyman Sheldon Silver make new request that Judge Valerie E Caproni dismiss charges of extortion, arguing that Silver's conduct does not amount to federal offense.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Mr. Silver, who was forced to step down as the Assembly speaker after his arrest, argued that the conduct he is accused of “simply does not amount to any federal offense.”

headline.main: Sheldon Silver’s Lawyers Again Ask Judge to Drop Indictment
headline.print_headline: Ex-Speaker’s Lawyers Again Ask Judge to Drop Indictment
